title: The Adventures of Lady: The Big Climb
description: "The Adventures of Lady: The Big Climb" is the second in the series ("The Adventures of Lady: The Big Storm" is also available). "The Big Climb" is the touching and motivational story of 2 squirrels. In this story, Lady helps Lil Fella overcome his greatest fear. By doing so, he discovers the rewarding feelings of accomplishment, which come along with pursuing goals. This sweet and moving story if perfectly matched with whole page brilliant color and detailed vivid illustration. Perfect for your child's reader and as a bedtime story. Authors, Iris Pearson and Mike Merrill are award winning writing partners. "The Adventures of Lady: The Big Storm" won the 2007 New York Book Festival Best Children's Book Award. "The Adventures of Lady: The Big Climb" is the second book in the series. Iris & Mike raised baby squirrels after Hurricane Charley and discovered each had a very unique personality. In their books, the authors beautifully combine real traits of their squirrels with children's fiction to create memorable stories.
author: Iris Pearson
